Based on your preference cues, I would recommend "Monsters, Inc." and "Dear John" as two potential recommendations.
"Monsters, Inc." is a animated film directed by Peter Docter and produced by Walt Disney Animation Studios. The film tells the story of Monstrosity Inc., a company that specializes in creating monsters for people to be afraid of. The film follows three young brothers who are hired by Monstrosity Inc. to create monsters. As they work on their monsters, the boys begin to question the motives of Monstrosity Inc. and the true nature of monsters themselves.
"Dear John" is a romantic drama film directed by Sam Mendes and produced by Studio Canal UK, Lions Gate International, StudioCanalEntertainment and WME Globocan Entertainment.
The film tells the story of John (played by Ryan Gosling)), a young man who lives in Los Angeles. John's life takes a dramatic turn when he meets Sarah (played by Emma Stone)).
As John falls deeply in love with Sarah, he becomes increasingly worried about their future together. As the situation becomes more and more tense between John and Sarah, both of them begin to question whether or not they are truly meant to be together.
